question: You recently took a trip with a taxi company. The driver behaved in an unacceptable way and you had a lot of problems. You complained to the company but no-one has replied to your complaint.Write a letter to the taxi company. In your lettersay why you are writing and how you feelexplain what happenedtell them what you would like them to do.Write at
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding the behaviour of one of your drivers. I am so frustrated about the incident.

Please be informed that I hired the service of one of your drivers last Monday, 2 September, 3 in the afternoon to be exact. Firstly, during the trip, the sound of the stereo inside the taxi is too loud. I tried to ask him to lower the volume but he ignore me. Additionally, the smell inside is not good, it is smell like cigarettes and lastly, there is no meter, he asked me to pay him a fixed amount.

Thus, I appreciated it if you could take the necessary actions for this. Kindly please investigate my complaint. Should you have any concerns regarding my letter, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
